other_tests.findings: Pathological examination revealed a subepidermal microvesicle. A lack of laminin-5 at the basement-membrane zone was noted, consistent with junctional epidermolysis bullosa.

Pathological examination with hematoxylin and eosin staining showed spongiotic dermatitis with intraepidermal vesicle formation and dyskeratosis. Stains for fungi and immunofluorescence staining were negative.
The serum level of zinc was 311 μg per liter, which is below the reference range (670 to 1240 μg per liter), confirming zinc deficiency.
